flavor_text_entries.flavor_text:
Il ne laisse jamais échapper ses proies.
Ses mâchoires surpuissantes peuvent
broyer une voiture.

They never allow prey to escape.
Their jaws are so powerful, they can
crush the body of an automobile.

Ses yeux ont les mêmes propriétés que
des jumelles et lui permettent de voir
les objets très éloignés en agrandi.

It can expand the focus of its eyes,
enabling it to see objects in the far
distance as if it were using binoculars.

Very violent Pokémon, they try
to clamp down on anything that
moves in front of their eyes.

Very violent Pokémon, they try
to clamp down on anything that
moves in front of their eyes.

とても　きょうぼうな　ポケモン。
めのまえで　うごくものは　すべて
おそいかかり　かみくだこうとする。

아주 난폭한 포켓몬.
눈앞에서 움직이는 것은 모두
덮쳐서 깨물어 부수려고 한다.

Un Pokémon extrêmement violent qui broie tout ce qui
lui passe sous les yeux avec ses mâchoires.

Ein äußerst grausames Pokémon. Es greift jeden,
der ihm unter die Augen kommt, mit seinen
scharfen Reißzähnen an.

Un Pokémon bastante violento. Ataca todo lo que se
mueva delante de él con sus mortíferas mandíbulas.

È un Pokémon molto feroce. Attacca tutto ciò che
gli si para davanti, prendendolo a morsi.

Very violent Pokémon, they try to clamp down on
anything that moves in front of their eyes.

とても　凶暴な　ポケモン。
目の前で　動くものは　すべて
襲いかかり　かみくだこうとする。

であった　えものは　にがさない。
じどうしゃの　ボディを　くいちぎる
きょうりょくな　あごを　もつ。

마주친 먹이는 놓치지 않는다.
자동차 몸체를 물어뜯을 만큼
강력한 턱을 가지고 있다.

Il ne laisse jamais échapper ses proies. Ses mâchoires
surpuissantes peuvent broyer une voiture.

Hat es seine Beute erblickt, gibt es kein Entrinnen
mehr. Sein mächtiger Kiefer knackt selbst Karosserien.

Jamás deja escapar a su presa. Sus mandíbulas son
capaces de destrozar la carrocería de un coche.

Una volta che l’ha presa, non si lascia più sfuggire
la preda. Ha delle mandibole in grado di fare a pezzi
un’automobile.

They never allow prey to escape. Their jaws
are so powerful, they can crush the body of
an automobile.

出会った　獲物は　逃がさない。
自動車の　ボディを　食いちぎる
強力な　アゴを　持つ。

とても　きょうぼうな　ポケモン。
めのまえで　うごくものは　すべて
おそいかかり　かみくだこうとする。

덮쳐서 깨물어 부수려고 한다.

delante de él con sus mortíferas mandíbulas.

È un Pokémon molto feroce. Attacca tutto ciò che gli si para
davanti, prendendolo a morsi.

Very violent Pokémon, they try to clamp down on
anything that moves in front of their eyes.

目の前で　動くものは　すべて
襲いかかり　かみくだこうとする。

であった　えものは　にがさない。
じどうしゃの　ボディを　くいちぎる
きょうりょくな　あごを　もつ。

마주친 먹이는 놓치지 않는다.
자동차 몸체를 물어뜯을 만큼
강력한 턱을 가지고 있다.

Il ne laisse jamais échapper ses proies. Ses mâchoires
surpuissantes peuvent broyer une voiture.

Hat es seine Beute erblickt, gibt es kein Entrinnen mehr.
Sein mächtiger Kiefer knackt selbst Karosserien.

Jamás deja escapar a su presa. Sus mandíbulas son capaces
de destrozar la carrocería de un coche.

Una volta che l’ha presa, non si lascia più sfuggire la preda.
Ha delle mandibole in grado di fare a pezzi un’automobile.

They never allow prey to escape. Their jaws
are so powerful, they can crush the body of
an automobile.

出会った　獲物は　逃がさない。
自動車の　ボディを　食いちぎる
強力な　アゴを　持つ。

すなあらしでも　５０キロさきに　いる
ちいさな　えものも　はっけんする
とくしゅな　りょうめを　もつ。

모래 폭풍 속에서도 50km 앞에 있는
작은 먹이를 발견하는
특수한 두 눈을 가졌다.

擁有特殊的雙眼，
即使在沙暴中也能發現
前方５０公里處的小獵物。

Ses yeux perçants lui permettent de détecter
une petite proie à 50 km, même au cœur
d’une tempête de sable.

Seine Augen sind so außergewöhnlich, dass es
sogar in einem Sandsturm kleinste Beute aus
50 km Entfernung entdecken kann.

Su vista es tan perspicaz que puede divisar
presas de pequeño tamaño a 50 km de
distancia, incluso en plena tormenta de arena.

I suoi occhi gli permettono di individuare prede
minuscole a 50 km di distanza persino nelle
tempeste di sabbia.

Its unique faculty of sight can detect small prey
more than 30 miles away, even in the midst of
a sandstorm.

砂嵐でも　５０キロ先に　いる
小さな　獲物も　発見する
特殊な　両目を　持つ。

拥有特殊的双眼，
即使在沙暴中也能发现
前方５０公里处的小猎物。

きょうりょくな　アゴで　かみつくと
そのまま　おもいきり　からだを
ひねり　えものを　せつだんする。

강력한 턱으로 물고
그대로 힘껏 몸을 비틀어
먹이를 절단한다.

用強力的顎咬住後，
狠狠地扭動身體，
將獵物切斷。

Ses mâchoires sont si puissantes qu’il lui arrive
de plier ou découper le corps de ses victimes
sans même s’en rendre compte.

Wenn es mit seinem mächtigen Kiefer zubeißt,
zerteilt es seine Beute mit einer Drehung seines
Körpers.

En cuanto le hinca el diente a su presa con sus
potentes mandíbulas, comienza a retorcerle el
cuerpo hasta despedazarla.

Cattura la preda con le possenti mandibole
e la serra con forza fino a tranciarla.

After clamping down with its powerful jaws,
it twists its body around to rip its prey in half.

強力な　アゴで　かみつくと
そのまま　思い切り　身体を
ひねり　獲物を　切断する。

用强力的颚咬住后，
就这么拼命扭转身体，
将猎物切断。

５０キロ　さきに　いる　えものを
みつけると　さばくを　およぐように
いどうして　とびかかり　かみつく。

50km 떨어져 있는 먹이를
발견하면 사막을 헤엄치듯이
이동하여 덤벼들어 덥석 문다.

當發現了前方５０公里處的獵物，
就會像游泳一樣在沙漠上移動，
然後飛撲過去咬住。

Il peut repérer une proie à une distance de
50 km. Il s’approche alors en « nageant » dans
le sable, puis lui saute dessus pour la croquer.

Entdeckt es Beute in bis zu 50 km Entfernung,
bewegt es sich schwimmend durch die Wüste,
bis es hervorspringt und nach ihr schnappt.

Al avistar una presa incluso a 50 km, repta
hacia ella por la arena como si nadara y se
abalanza para despedazarla con sus fauces.

Individua la preda anche a 50 km di distanza e
avanza verso di essa come se nuotasse nella
sabbia per poi balzarle addosso e azzannarla.

When it spots prey, even at a distance of over
30 miles, it swims through the desert as if it
were water, then jumps out and chomps them.

５０キロ　先に　いる　獲物を
見つけると　砂漠を　泳ぐように
移動して　飛びかかり　噛みつく。

如果发现前方５０公里处的猎物，
就会像游泳一样在沙漠里移动，
扑过去咬住。

フライゴンの　おこす　すなあらしに
みを　ひそめて　えものが　くるのを
じっと　まちかまえている。

플라이곤이 일으키는 모래바람에
몸을 숨기고 먹이가 오는 것을
가만히 기다리고 있다.

會藏身在沙漠蜻蜓
引發的沙暴中，靜靜
等待著獵物的到來。

Lors des tempêtes de sable provoquées par
Libégon, il se terre dans le sol, à l’affût d’une
proie.

Es legt sich inmitten eines Sandsturms, der von
Libelldra entfacht wurde, auf die Lauer und
wartet dort geduldig auf seine Beute.

Se oculta en las tormentas de arena provocadas
por Flygon y espera pacientemente al acecho
de su presa.

Si nasconde nelle tempeste di sabbia create
dai Flygon aspettando immobile che passi
una preda.

It conceals itself in sandstorms that Flygon
whip up and waits patiently for prey to appear.

フライゴンの　起こす　砂嵐に
身を　潜めて　獲物が　くるのを
じっと　待ちかまえている。

把身体藏在沙漠蜻蜓引起的沙暴中，
静静地等待着猎物的到来。

すなの　ギャングとも　よばれる。
きょうりょくな　アゴで　ぶあつい
てっぱんも　たやすく　くいちぎる。

모래의 건달이라고도 불린다.
강력한 턱으로 두꺼운
철판도 쉽게 물어뜯는다.

又被稱為沙之惡霸。
就連厚厚的鐵板也能被牠
用強力的下顎輕鬆咬爛。

Il peut broyer d’épaisses plaques de fer
d’un simple coup de mâchoire. On l’appelle
le « tyran des sables ».

Es wird auch als „Tyrann der Wüste“ bezeichnet.
Mit seinem mächtigen Kiefer durchbeißt es selbst
dicke Eisenplatten mit Leichtigkeit.

Se lo conoce como el Terror de las Arenas. Con
sus fuertes mandíbulas es capaz de destrozar a
mordiscos una plancha de hierro fácilmente.

Viene chiamato “Tiranno del deserto”. Grazie
alle possenti mascelle è in grado di fare a pezzi
spesse lastre di metallo senza sforzo.

This Pokémon is known as the Bully of the Sands.
Krookodile’s mighty jaws can bite through heavy
plates of iron with almost no effort at all.

砂の　ギャングとも　呼ばれる。
強力な　顎で　ぶ厚い
鉄板も　たやすく　食いちぎる。

被称为沙之恶霸。
就连厚厚的铁板也能
用强力的颚轻松咬断。

きょうぼうだが　えものの　ために
すなのなかで　なんにちも　まつ
にんたいづよさも　もっているぞ。

난폭하지만 먹이를 잡기 위해
모래 속에서 며칠이든 기다리는
강한 인내력도 갖고 있다.

雖然凶暴，但同時也具有
很強的忍耐力。為了捕捉
獵物能在沙子裡等上很多天。

Il aime la violence, mais sait aussi se montrer
patient lorsqu’il doit passer plusieurs jours
dans le sable à attendre une proie.

Rabigator ist zwar aggressiv, doch wenn es bei
der Jagd nach Beute auf der Lauer liegt, kann es
auch mehrere Tage geduldig im Sand ausharren.

Es de naturaleza violenta, pero también tiene
la paciencia necesaria para esperar a su presa
oculto en la arena durante varios días.

È un Pokémon molto feroce. Quando si tratta
di catturare le prede è in grado di aspettare
pazientemente nella sabbia per giorni.

While terribly aggressive, Krookodile also has
the patience to stay hidden under sand for days,
lying in wait for prey.

凶暴だが　獲物の　ために
砂の中で　何日も　待つ
忍耐強さも　もっているぞ。

虽然凶暴，但也有擅长忍耐的一面。
为了捕获猎物，可以在
沙子里静静等上好几天。

ability.effect:
When this Pokémon enters battle, the opponent's Attack is lowered by one stage.  In a double battle, both opponents are affected.

This ability also takes effect when acquired during a battle, but will not take effect again if lost and reobtained without leaving battle.

This ability has no effect on an opponent that has a substitute.

Overworld: If the first Pokémon in the party has this ability, any random encounter with a Pokémon five or more levels lower than it has a 50% chance of being skipped.
ability.short_effect: Lowers opponents' Attack one stage upon entering battle.

This Pokémon's Attack rises one stage upon knocking out another Pokémon, even a friendly Pokémon.

This ability does not take effect when the Pokémon indirectly causes another Pokémon to faint, e.g. through poison or spikes.

If this Pokémon knocks out a Pokémon with mummy, the former's ability will change without taking effect.

move.effect:
Transfers 1/4 the user's max HP into a doll that absorbs damage and causes most negative move effects to fail.  If the user leaves the field, the doll will vanish.  If the user cannot pay the HP cost, this move will fail.

The doll takes damage as normal, using the user's stats and types, and will break when its HP reaches zero.  Self-inflicted damage from confusion or recoil is not absorbed.  Healing effects from opponents ignore the doll and heal the user as normal.  Moves that work based on the user's HP still do so; the doll's HP does not influence any move.

The doll will block major status effects, confusion, and flinching.  The effects of smelling salts and wake up slap do not trigger against a doll, even if the Pokémon behind the doll has the appropriate major status effect.  Multi-turn trapping moves like wrap will hit the doll for their regular damage, but the multi-turn trapping and damage effects will not activate.

Moves blocked or damage absorbed by the doll do not count as hitting the user or inflicting damage for any effects that respond to such, e.g., avalanche, counter, or a rowap berry.  magic coat still works as normal, even against moves the doll would block.  Opposing Pokémon that damage the doll with a leech move like absorb are healed as normal.

It will also block acupressure, block, the curse effect of curse, dream eater, embargo, flatter, gastro acid, grudge, heal block, leech seed, lock on, mean look, mimic, mind reader, nightmare, pain split, psycho shift, spider web, sketch, swagger, switcheroo, trick, worry seed, and yawn.  A Pokémon affected by yawn before summoning the doll will still fall to sleep.

The doll blocks intimidate, but all other abilities act as though the doll did not exist.  If the user has an ability that absorbs moves of a certain type for HP (such as volt absorb absorbing thunder wave), such moves will not be blocked.

life orb and berries that cause confusion still work as normal, but their respective HP loss and confusion are absorbed/blocked by the doll.

The user is still vulnerable to damage inflicted when entering or leaving the field, such as by pursuit or spikes; however, the doll will block the poison effect of toxic spikes.

The doll is passed on by baton pass.  It keeps its existing HP, but uses the replacement Pokémon's stats and types for damage calculation.

All other effects work as normal.
move.short_effect: Transfers 1/4 of the user's max HP into a doll, protecting the user from further damage or status changes until it breaks.

If the user successfully used detect, endure, protect, quick guard, or wide guard on the last turn, this move has a 50% chance to fail.

thunder during rain dance and blizzard during hail have a 30% chance to break through this move.

* imprison

* shadow force
* Moves that merely copy the user, such as transform or psych up

This move cannot be selected by assist or metronome.

move.effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  Power and type are determined by the user's IVs.

Power is given by `x * 40 / 63 + 30`.  `x` is obtained by arranging bit 1 from the IV for each of Special Defense, Special Attack, Speed, Defense, Attack, and HP in that order.  (Bit 1 is 1 if the IV is of the form `4n + 2` or `4n + 3`.  `x` is then 64 * Special Defense IV bit 1, plus 32 * Special Attack IV bit 1, etc.)

Power is always between 30 and 70, inclusive.  Average power is 49.5.

Type is given by `y * 15 / 63`, where `y` is similar to `x` above, except constructed from bit 0.  (Bit 0 is 1 if the IV is odd.)  The result is looked up in the following table.

Value | Type
----: | --------
    0 | fighting
    1 | flying
    2 | poison
    3 | ground
    4 | rock
    5 | bug
    6 | ghost
    7 | steel
    8 | fire
    9 | water
   10 | grass
   11 | electric
   12 | psychic
   13 | ice
   14 | dragon
   15 | dark

This move thus cannot be normal.  Most other types have an equal 1/16 chance to be selected, given random IVs.  However, due to the flooring used here, bug, fighting, and grass appear 5/64 of the time, and dark only 1/64 of the time.
move.short_effect: Power and type depend upon user's IVs.  Power can range from 30 to 70.

move.effect:
The next time a Pokémon uses a beneficial move on itself or itself and its ally this turn, the user of this move will steal the move and use it itself.  Moves which may be stolen by this move are identified by the "snatchable" flag.

If two Pokémon use this move on the same turn, the faster Pokémon will steal the first beneficial move, and the slower Pokémon will then steal it again—thus, only the slowest Pokémon using this move ultimately gains a stolen move's effect.

If the user steals psych up, it will target the Pokémon that used psych up.  If the user was the original target of psych up, and the Pokémon that originally used it's affected by pressure, it will only lose 1 PP.

This move cannot be copied by mirror move, nor selected by assist or metronome.
